attributes.action: To stop supplying weapons to the Saudi Arabian government against Yemen
attributes.additional_details: The British government have allowed arms and other weapons to be sold to Saudi Arabia. If the government cut the supply of the weapons this should help in stopping the killings of many innocent people in Yemen.
attributes.background:
To stop the supply of weapons to Saudi Arabia. 

To hold Saudi Arabia accountable for its actions against the citizens of Yemen. 

To pressure the Saudi government to end the war and the blockade of Yemen
